about.title: About Us
about.intro: Get to know Marketing bel arabi team
about.text: Marketing bel arabi started as a passionate volunteer team, driven by a genuine desire to transform marketing concepts in the Arab market, presenting them in an accessible Arabic language close to people. We believe in supporting and empowering youth, and we strive to provide professional marketing services based on knowledge, productivity, teamwork, along with our commitment to social responsibility.

hero.title: About Marketing bel arabi
hero.description: We are a leading digital marketing agency dedicated to helping businesses grow their online presence and achieve their marketing goals.

story.title: Our Story
story.intro: From humble beginnings to industry leadership - the journey that defines who we are today.
story.content: Founded with a vision to transform how businesses connect with their audience in the digital world, Marketing bel arabi has grown from a small team of passionate marketers to a comprehensive digital agency. Our journey has been marked by continuous innovation, client success stories, and a commitment to excellence that drives everything we do.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.intro: These principles guide our work and define our approach to every project we undertake.

value1.title: Client Partnership
value1.description: We view our clients as partners, working together to achieve shared goals and long-term success.

value2.title: Innovation
value2.description: We constantly explore new technologies and strategies to keep our clients at the forefront of digital marketing.

value3.title: Results-Driven
value3.description: We focus on delivering measurable outcomes that contribute directly to our clients' business objectives.

value4.title: Integrity
value4.description: We operate with transparency, honesty, and ethical practices in all our business dealings.

value5.title: Excellence
value5.description: We strive for the highest standards in everything we do, from strategy development to execution.

value6.title: Adaptability
value6.description: We embrace change and quickly adapt to evolving market conditions and client needs.

statistics.title: Our Achievements
statistics.intro: We have delivered tangible results for our clients, with their projects showing significant performance and growth improvements. We are here to turn every idea into reality.

stat1.title: Clients
stat1.description: We have worked with more than 50 entrepreneurs and project owners to achieve their marketing goals

stat2.title: Projects
stat2.description: We have completed more than 100 marketing campaigns, content pages, visual identities, marketing plans, websites, and more

stat3.title: Years
stat3.description: Over a decade of experience in digital marketing

stat4.title: Team Members
stat4.description: Professional specialists dedicated to your success

cta.title: Ready to Work With Us?
cta.description: Contact our team today to discuss your project and how we can help you achieve your digital marketing goals.

hero.title: Projects We're Proud Of
hero.description: At 'Marketing bel arabi', we translate our clients' ideas into tangible results. We have implemented successful projects in digital marketing, design, website development, and creative content, which have contributed to the growth and spread of many brands.

projects.title: Our Work
projects.description: We believe our results speak for themselves. You can browse our previous work in digital marketing, design, and website and application development by searching or filtering by project type.

cta.title: Want to develop your project?
cta.description: Contact us today to start developing your project.

hero.title: Comprehensive Digital Marketing Services for Your Business Growth
hero.description: At 'Marketing bel arabi', we offer a comprehensive package of digital marketing services tailored to your needs, from managing advertising campaigns and social media, to designing visual identity and developing websites and applications. We also work on preparing professional marketing studies, improving sales processes, and implementing professional visual production to help you deliver your message effectively and attractively.

packages.title: Our Packages
packages.description: At 'Marketing bel arabi', we offer a range of flexible packages designed to suit different business needs, whether you're a startup looking for a launch or an established organization seeking expansion.

launch.title: Launch Pack
launch.subtitle: For startups and new idea owners
launch.feature1: Managing one social media account (design + content)
launch.goal: Goal: Establishing a simple and effective digital presence.

growth.title: Growth Pack
growth.subtitle: For small and medium businesses
growth.feature1: Managing two social media accounts (content + design + analysis)
growth.feature5: Marketing content for posts and ads
growth.goal: Goal: Growing the brand and increasing revenue.

elite.title: Elite Pack
elite.subtitle: For large companies and leading brands
elite.feature1: Integrated management of 3 or more accounts
elite.feature2: Comprehensive design for complete identity and brochures
elite.goal: Goal: Market leadership with calculated growth.
